item.blazinghot.blaze_arrow.tooltip.summ: Deals _extra damage_ when hitting a target in _The Nether_ dimension
item.blazinghot.modern_lamp.tooltip.summ: A _modern_ lamp that can be used to _light up_ your builds, either _manually_ or by _redstone_!
item.blazinghot.modern_lamp.tooltip.beha: _Locks_ the ability of _toggling_ the lamp _by hand_
